commitResults.messageTitle: Duke's name change to Socks; Added greeting & exit
commitResults.messageBody:
Implemented initial skeleton for the Socks chatbot:
- Added greeting message

- Added exit message

commitResults.messageTitle: Added ability for socks to echo user's message
commitResults.messageBody:
sock takes in userinput and if it matches with "bye"(not cases
sensitive) it prompts exit message and ends the session, otherwise, it
echo's the user's input command back on the terminal.

commitResults.messageTitle: Added sock's ability to add tasks & list them
Added Sock's ability to mark and unmark tasks.
commitResults.messageBody:
Socks is also able to handle user input errors like
- invalid mark
- invalid unmark

commitResults.messageTitle: added appropriate classes to handle relevant methods
commitResults.messageBody:
-added todo class
-added deadline class
-added event class
-added task manager class
-refactor main program to appropriate methods

commitResults.messageTitle: added helpful comments and fixed code quality
